raw_body: At rest with Jesus. Beloved wife of late Reggie Bolling, step-mother of Derrick, daughter of the late Michael and late Beatrice Fernando, loving sister of late Carryl, late Aleric, Trisette, late Michael, Wivina, Charmaine, Bellamin, Firmin and Petronella, fond aunt to many nieces and nephews. Cortege leaving A.F. Raymond Funeral Parlour at 11.00 a.m. on Thursday 30th November for cremation at General Cemetery, Borella at 11.30 a.m. (New Cremator
